text:
January 22, 2018 / 2:55 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-AT&T Expands Network Into Equinix Data Centers With On-Demand Capabilities For Businesses Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 22 (Reuters) - AT&T INC: 
* EXPANDS NETWORK INTO EQUINIX DATA CENTERS WITH ON-DEMAND CAPABILITIES FOR BUSINESSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
